snippet.title: 'Rio 2 flies into theaters, joining these other movie birds
snippet.description: You never can tell how movie birds will behave

snippet.title: Celeb birthdays for the week of April 13-19
snippet.description: April 13: Actor Lyle Waggoner ("The Carol Burnett Show") is 79. Actor Edward Fox is 77. Actor Paul Sorvino is 75. Singer Lester Chambers of The Chambers Brothers is 74. Musician Jack Casady of Jefferson Airplane is 70. Actor Tony Dow ("Leave It to Beaver") is 69. Musician Al Green is 68. Actor Ron Perlman is 64. Singer Peabo Bryson is 63. Drummer Max Weinberg of the E Street Band (and "Late Night With Conan O'Brien") is 63. Keyboardist Jimmy Destri (Blondie) is 60. Singer-bassist Louis Johnson of The Brothers Johnson is 59. Actress Saundra Santiago ("Miami Vice") is 57. Guitarist Joey Mazzola of Sponge is 53. Actress Page Hannah (TV's "Fame") is 50. Actress-comedian Caroline Rhea ("Sabrina the Teenage Witch," ''The Biggest Loser") is 50. Bassist Lisa Umbarger (The Toadies) is 49. Guitarist Marc Ford (Black Crowes) is 48. Actor Ricky Schroder is 44. Singer Aaron Lewis of Staind is 42. Singer Lou Bega is 39. Actor Glenn Howerton ("It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia") is 38. Singer Nellie McKay is 32. Actress Allison Williams ("Girls") is 26.

snippet.title: Tolkien to the extreme
snippet.description: I'm not the target audience for "The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug." I've read "The Hobbit" and the "Lord of the Rings" books, but only once. I tried "The Silmarillion," Tolkien's prequel to, well, everything, but gave up. Maybe it would have helped me navigate the 2 -hour film.

snippet.title: 'The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug' movie review: A fun redemption of the franchise
snippet.description: Second time's the charm: Peter Jackson sophomore 'Hobbit' outing exudes a deeper, darker intensity.
